typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PersonID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmployeeExcel
EmployeeExcel select(mapColumn(
		FromSelectPersonID = PersonID,
		FromSelectLastName = LastName,
		FromSelectFirstName = FirstName,
		FromSelectAddress = Address,
		FromSelectCity = City
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Myview
Myview derive(ToPersonID = toInteger(FromSelectPersonID)) ~> IntegerPersonID
IntegerPersonID derive(Fullname = concat(FromSelectFirstName, FromSelectLastName)) ~> Fullname
Fullname sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PersonID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		Fullname as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PersonID = ToPersonID,
		LastName = FromSelectLastName,
		FirstName = FromSelectFirstName,
		Address = FromSelectAddress,
		City = FromSelectCity,
		Fullname
	)) ~> MyOutput
